00030 #define SET_PROC_EXTERN(proc)

00032 #define CHECK_STOP_AT_PHASE_END() (sc_get_curr_simcontext()->sim_status() == SC_SIM_USER_STOP )
00033 
00034 #define NODE_CONSTRUCTION_DONE(pmod) \
00035     uvm_component* comp = DCAST<uvm_component*>(pmod); \
00036     if (comp) { \
00037         comp->build_phase(this); \
00038     }
00039 
00040 #define QUASI_STATIC_END_OF_CONSTRUCTION() 
00041 
00042 #define NODE_CONNECT(pmod) { uvm_component* comp = DCAST<uvm_component*>(pmod); if (comp) comp->connect_phase(this); }
00043 
00044 #define QUASI_STATIC_COMPLETE_BINDING()
00045 
00046 #define NODE_END_OF_ELABORATION(pmod) \
00047     uvm_component* comp = DCAST<uvm_component*>(pmod); \
00048     if (comp) \
00049         comp->end_of_elaboration_phase(this); \
00050 
00051 #define QUASI_STATIC_END_OF_ELABORATION()
00052 
00053 #define NODE_START_OF_SIMULATION(pmod) \
00054     uvm_component* comp = DCAST<uvm_component*>(pmod); \
00055     if (comp) \
00056         comp->start_of_simulation_phase(this); 
00057 #define QUASI_STATIC_START_OF_SIMULATION()
00058 
00059 #define QUASI_STATIC_PREPARE_TO_SIMULATE()

00061 #define UVM_SC_CO_SIMULATE(time)
